> Well, just to throw you for a further loop, I'm doing it with

You should use GET rather than POST.

> 
> I'm doing it this way because my HTTP server is 
> single-threaded, so I can't tie it up with an open socket.
With non-blocking IO you don't have to dedicate the thread to handle a
single connection.
